mapper.select: select id,name from comm_states
select id from assess_fs where name='${gems}'

select count(ki.gems_fs_id) gems,af.`name` name from kj_icbc ki,assess_fs af where ki.gems_fs_id=af.id and ki.app=0 and month(ki.dt_add)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(ki.dt_add)=year(SYSDATE()) and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id} ) GROUP BY ki.gems_fs_id ORDER BY count(ki.gems_fs_id) DESC

select count(ki.gems_fs_id) gems,af.`name` name from kj_icbc ki,assess_fs af,icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir where ki.gems_fs_id=af.id and ki.app=0 and month(iekir.fk_date)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(iekir.fk_date)=year(SYSDATE()) and iekir.icbc_id=ki.id and iekir.`status`=62 and iekir.result_1_code=1 and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id} ) GROUP BY ki.gems_fs_id ORDER BY count(ki.gems_fs_id) DESC

select round(other.gems/count(other.Oid),2) rate,other.`name` name from (select kic.gems_fs_id Oid,count(kic.gems_fs_id) gems,af.`name` from kjs_icbc_cardk kic,assess_fs af,kj_icbc ki where kic.gems_fs_id=af.id and ki.id=kic.icbc_id and ki.app=0 and month(kic.dt_sub)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(kic.dt_sub)=year(SYSDATE()) and kic.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id} ) and kic.bc_status=3 GROUP BY kic.gems_fs_id) other, (select kic.gems_fs_id Aid from kjs_icbc_cardk kic where month(kic.dt_sub)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(kic.dt_sub)=year(SYSDATE()) and kic.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id} )) amount where other.Oid=amount.Aid GROUP BY other.Oid ORDER BY rate DESC
select count(*) amount from kj_icbc where month(dt_add)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(dt_add)=year(SYSDATE()) and app=0 and gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id})

select count(ki.id) amount,sum(iekir.fk_money) money from kj_icbc ki,icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir where month(iekir.fk_date)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(iekir.fk_date)=year(SYSDATE()) and ki.app=0 and iekir.`status`=62 and iekir.result_1_code=1 and ki.id=iekir.icbc_id and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id})

select count(icbc_id) amount,sum(fk_money) money from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result where icbc_id in(select icbc_id from kj_icbc ki,icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir where month(iekir.fk_date)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(iekir.fk_date)=year(SYSDATE()) and ki.app=0 and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) and iekir.`status` >= 72 and iekir.`status` < 82 and ki.id=iekir.icbc_id group by icbc_id) and `status`=62 and result_1_code=1

select count(kik.kk_loan_stateid) sell,cs.`name` name from kj_icbc ki,comm_states cs,kjs_icbc_kk kik where kik.kk_loan_stateid=cs.id and kik.icbc_id=ki.id and ki.app=0 and month(ki.dt_add)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(ki.dt_add)=year(SYSDATE()) and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) GROUP BY kik.kk_loan_stateid ORDER BY count(kik.kk_loan_stateid) DESC

select count(kik.kk_loan_stateid) sell,cs.`name` name from kjs_icbc_kk kik,comm_states cs,icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir,kj_icbc ki where kik.kk_loan_stateid=cs.id and iekir.icbc_id=kik.icbc_id and kik.icbc_id=ki.id and ki.app=0 and month(iekir.fk_date)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(iekir.fk_date)=year(SYSDATE()) and iekir.status=62 and iekir.result_1_code=1 and kik.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) GROUP BY kik.kk_loan_stateid ORDER BY count(kik.kk_loan_stateid) DESC

select sum(case when cardage.card >= 18 and cardage.card < 30 then 1 end) age1, sum(case when cardage.card >= 30 and cardage.card < 40 then 1 end) age2, sum(case when cardage.card >= 40 and cardage.card < 50 then 1 end) age3, sum(case when cardage.card >= 50 then 1 end) age4 from (select (year(SYSDATE())-Mid(c_cardno,7,4)) card from kj_icbc where gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) and app=0 ) cardage

select sum(case when carage.age >= 1 and carage.age < 3 then 1 end) age1, sum(case when carage.age >= 3 and carage.age < 6 then 1 end) age2, sum(case when carage.age >= 6 and carage.age < 9 then 1 end) age3, sum(case when carage.age >= 9 then 1 end) age4 from (select (year(ki.dt_sub)-year(ac.cardt1)) age from assess_cars ac,kj_icbc ki where ki.id=ac.icbc_id and ki.app=0 and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) and ac.cars_type=1) carage

select year(yh_date.fk_date) year, month(yh_date.fk_date) month, avg(timestampdiff(day,dz_date.dt_sub,yh_date.fk_date)) adate from (select iekir.icbc_id,iekir.dt_sub from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir,kj_icbc ki where iekir.`status`=52 and ki.app=0 and iekir.result_1_code=1 and ki.id=iekir.icbc_id
and ki.id in(select icbc_id from kjs_icbc_kk where year(SYSDATE())-year(dt_add) < 6 and kk_loan_stateid=${city_id})
and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) ) dz_date, (select iekir.icbc_id,iekir.fk_date from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir,kj_icbc ki where iekir.`status`=62 and iekir.result_1_code=1 and ki.id=iekir.icbc_id andki.app=0
and ki.id in(select icbc_id from kjs_icbc_kk where year(SYSDATE())-year(dt_add) < 6 and kk_loan_stateid=${city_id})
and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) ) yh_date where dz_date.icbc_id=yh_date.icbc_id GROUP BY year(yh_date.fk_date),month(yh_date.fk_date) ORDER BY yh_date.fk_date DESC limit 12

select count(*) from kjs_icbc_cardk kic,kj_icbc ki where month(kic.dt_sub)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(kic.dt_sub)=year(SYSDATE()) and ki.app=0 and ki.id=kic.icbc_id and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id})

select count(*) from kjs_icbc_cardk kic,kj_icbc ki where month(kic.dt_sub)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(kic.dt_sub)=year(SYSDATE()) and ki.app=0 and kic.bc_status=3 and ki.id=kic.icbc_id and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id})

select round(other.Osell/count(other.Oid),2) rate,other.`name` name from (select loan.kk_loan_stateid Oid,count(loan.kk_loan_stateid) Osell,cs.`name` from (select kik.kk_loan_stateid from kjs_icbc_cardk kic,kjs_icbc_kk kik,kj_icbc ki where kik.icbc_id=kic.icbc_id and month(kic.dt_sub)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(kic.dt_sub)=year(SYSDATE()) and ki.app=0 and ki.id=kic.icbc_id and kic.bc_status=3 and kik.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) ) loan, comm_states cs where loan.kk_loan_stateid=cs.id GROUP BY loan.kk_loan_stateid ORDER BY count(loan.kk_loan_stateid) DESC) other, (select kik.kk_loan_stateid Aid from kjs_icbc_cardk kic,kjs_icbc_kk kik,kj_icbc ki where kik.icbc_id=kic.icbc_id and ki.app=0 and ki.id=kic.icbc_id and kik.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id} ) and month(kic.dt_sub)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(kic.dt_sub)=year(SYSDATE())) amount where amount.Aid=other.Oid GROUP BY other.Oid ORDER BY rate DESC

select round(m2.loan*100/m1.amount,2) yuqilv,m2.gid,m2.gname from (select count(di.gems_fs_id) amount,f.id gid,f.name gname from kj_icbc di,assess_fs f,icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir where di.id=iekir.icbc_id and f.id=di.gems_fs_id and iekir.`status`=62 and di.app=0 and iekir.result_1_code=1 and di.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) GROUP BY di.gems_fs_id) m1, (select count(lol.gems_fs_id) loan,f.id gid,f.name gname from loan_overdue_list lol,assess_fs f,kj_icbc di where lol.type_id!=6 and f.id=lol.gems_fs_id and di.app=0 and di.id=lol.icbc_id and lol.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) GROUP BY lol.gems_fs_id) m2 where m1.gid=m2.gid ORDER BY yuqilv desc

select m1.amount m1a,m1.money/10000 m1m, m2.amount m2a,m2.money/10000 m2m, m3.amount m3a,m3.money/10000 m3m from (select count(*) amount,sum(lol.overdue_amount) money from loan_overdue_list lol,kj_icbc di,assess_cars dic where lol.overdue_days < 30 and lol.type_id!=6 and lol.icbc_id=di.id and di.app=0 and dic.icbc_id=lol.icbc_id
and di.gems_fs_id=${gems_id}
and dic.cars_type=1
and dic.cars_type=2
and di.id in(select icbc_id from kjs_icbc_kk where year(SYSDATE())-year(dt_add) < 6 and kk_loan_stateid=${city_id})
and di.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) ) m1,(select count(*) amount,sum(lol.overdue_amount) money from loan_overdue_list lol,kj_icbc di,assess_cars dic where lol.overdue_days < 60 and lol.overdue_days >= 30 and lol.type_id!=6 and di.app=0 and lol.icbc_id=di.id and dic.icbc_id=lol.icbc_id
and di.gems_fs_id=${gems_id}
and di.id in(select icbc_id from kjs_icbc_kk where year(SYSDATE())-year(dt_add) < 6 and kk_loan_stateid=${city_id})
and dic.cars_type=1
and dic.cars_type=2
and di.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) ) m2,(select count(*) amount,sum(lol.overdue_amount) money from loan_overdue_list lol,kj_icbc di,assess_cars dic where lol.overdue_days >= 60 and lol.type_id!=6 and lol.icbc_id=di.id and di.app=0 and dic.icbc_id=lol.icbc_id
and di.gems_fs_id=${gems_id}
and di.id in(select icbc_id from kjs_icbc_kk where year(SYSDATE())-year(dt_add) < 6 and kk_loan_stateid=${city_id})
and dic.cars_type=1
and dic.cars_type=2
and di.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) ) m3

select count(cs.name) amount,sum(lol.overdue_amount) money,cs.name cname from loan_overdue_list lol,kjs_icbc_kk kik,comm_states cs,kj_icbc ki where kik.icbc_id=lol.icbc_id and kik.kk_loan_stateid=cs.id and ki.app=0 and ki.id=lol.icbc_id and lol.type_id!=6 and lol.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) GROUP BY cname ORDER BY amount limit 0,6

select sum(other.amount) Oamount,sum(other.money) Omoney from (select count(cs.name) amount,sum(lol.overdue_amount) money,cs.name cname from loan_overdue_list lol,kjs_icbc_kk kik,comm_states cs,kj_icbc ki where kik.icbc_id=lol.icbc_id and kik.kk_loan_stateid=cs.id and lol.type_id!=6 and ki.app=0 and ki.id=lol.icbc_id and lol.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) GROUP BY cname ORDER BY amount limit 5,30 ) other
select year(SYSDATE()) years,count(*) amount from kj_icbc where YEAR(dt_add)=year(SYSDATE()) and app=0 and gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id})

select round(avg(timestampdiff(day,ki.dt_add,iekir.fk_date)),2) da from kj_icbc ki,icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir where iekir.status=62 and iekir.result_1_code=1 and ki.app=0 and year(SYSDATE())=year(ki.dt_add) and ki.id=iekir.icbc_id and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id})

select count(*) amount from loan_overdue_list lol,kj_icbc ki where lol.overdue_days < 30 and lol.type_id!=6 and ki.app=0 and ki.id=lol.icbc_id and year(SYSDATE())=year(lol.dt_add) and lol.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id})

select count(*) amount from kj_icbc ki,icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir where iekir.status=81 and ki.app=0 and ki.id=iekir.icbc_id and year(SYSDATE())=year(ki.dt_add) and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id})

select count(*) amount from loan_overdue_list lol,kj_icbc ki where lol.overdue_days>=60 and lol.type_id!=6 and ki.app=0 and ki.id=lol.icbc_id and year(SYSDATE())=year(lol.dt_add) and lol.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id})
